data.name: Nightmare Tag
data.description:
A multiplayer PvP Horror Experience packed full of INTENSE CHASES & JUMP SCARES! In Nightmare tag, you can either be one of the mortal humans trying to run and hide for your life, geared only with your flashgun, scanner, and a variety of surreal attachments. Or, become the blood-hungry monster to terrify your friends! Nightmare tag will have you and your friends screaming, laughing, yelling, & sweating until your headset runs out of power! 

BECOME THE NIGHTMARE: 
- Find & chase your friends before they escape the liminal Dreamscape!
- Unique controller motion movement to use your claws to run, jump, and tear apart humans!
- Track & hunt humans using your many abilities!
- Eliminate all the humans to win as the monster

RUN FOR YOUR LIFE: 
- Join your friends as you Run and Hide from the Nightmare!
- Hide by being completely motionless, making you invisible to the monster
- Physical Running Motion allows you to sprint when you are found and need to escape!
- Your flashgun is your only weapon, use it to see where you're going and stun the monster!
- Use your scanner to locate the monster, reunite with other humans, find power-ups, and find the objective.
- Complete the objective win as the humans!

MULTIPLE GAME MODES:
- Quick Tag
- VHS Run (requires General Admission)
+ A variety of game and map settings to shake things up!

GENERAL ADMISSION (IAP):
- Unlock 6 more zones
- Unlock "VHS Run" Game mode
